entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
